name: dBASE IV Compiled Report (Legacy)
summary: A FRO file is a compiled report created by dBASE IV, an older version of the dBASE database management software. It stores a report in a format that allows users to view data from a database in a structured format (based on the report's parameters). dBASE replaced FRO files with the REO file type.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
